snippet.title: Crash The Core - Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out Crash The Core on Steam -https://store.steampowered.com/app/1291220/Crash_The_Core/

A sci-fantasy roguelike deck builder with co-op where you equip gadgets, summon allies, and scrap cards/units using the battlefield system designed to emphasize powerful card synergies. Discover strange events, go fishing and gather Intel to uncover a conspiracy to take over the galaxy!
